group.label: Ethics declaration and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study is approved by the Mount Sinai Hospital research ethics board (Study ID: 424901). All institutions involved in recruitment of study participants received local ethics board approval. Informed consent was obtained from all participants in the study. Participant data were de-identified.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors have no relevant financial or non-financial interests to disclose.

assertion.label: Free to read
assertion.name: free
assertion.value: This content has been made available to all.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
